channel.title: NIO Java IRC Bot Framework
channel.description:
So about a week ago I slapped together a decent framework for the IRC protocol. The framework is pretty easy to expand on and for the most part clean. I've gone over some improvements with super_ so expect to see them whenever I get a chance. The bot is event-driven, has a plugin system and utilizes the Netty library for NIO networking. Overkill? Perhaps.
Feel free to fork this and do whatever you want with it, but please out of courtesy, acknowledge its origin. Also, feel free to leave comments/suggestions here.
src: https://github.com/t4/JavaIRCBot

item.title: NIO Java IRC Bot Framework
item.dc:creator: @_s11 s1gma
item.description:
@_s11 wrote:

as i said on IRC (ironically) make it so that the configuration file can be specified in the BotProperties constructor/a setter and hook it up to the program args to it. since it’s unfinished and there isn’t a lot to comment on yet, gl

Read full topic
